body: i'm thankful for [sarah](https://twitter.com/geekylonglegs), who makes me [laugh](https://twitter.com/geekylonglegs/status/838586813585457153) and makes me [cry](https://www.vice.com/en_id/article/i-went-to-a-pro-islamophobia-rally-in-my-hijab). i'm thankful for [safy](https://twitter.com/SafyHallanFarah) and [her friendship](https://twitter.com/SafyHallanFarah/status/839111089749180417) with sarah, which is both hilariously confrontational and at the same time nourishing. i'm thankful for [JENNY HOLZER](https://twitter.com/HOLZERTRON). i'm thankful for [mira gonzalez](https://twitter.com/miragonz?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor), who i feel a deep spiritual kinship with. i'm thankful for [meaghan](http://twitter.com/meaghano) and thankful for [friendships](http://nymag.com/thecut/2016/05/17-women-talk-about-how-to-make-friends.html). i'm thankful that [claire](http://twitter.com/clocarus) now has [a podcast,](https://soundcloud.com/user-164586239/tracks) which includes "_a grooming component, a workout component, and a literary component._" i'm thankful for [evie](https://twitter.com/ohevie), who tells [important stories](http://tinyletter.com/ohevie/letters/everything-happened-vol-114). i'm thankful for [kate compton](https://twitter.com/GalaxyKate) and [sailor mercury](https://twitter.com/sailorhg), who make [technology](http://tracery.io/) [more accessible](https://shop.bubblesort.io/). i'm thankful for [lucie](https://twitter.com/LucieBritsch), who asks [important questions](https://twitter.com/LucieBritsch). i'm thankful for [jay som](https://twitter.com/jaysomband) and to get to listen to [the new album she recorded by herself](http://www.cbcmusic.ca/first-plays/195/jay-som-everybody-works). i'm thankful for [jenna](https://twitter.com/weirdknifegirl) and [her zine](http://www.whatsmineisyrs.com/shop/) and [kristie](https://twitter.com/chuatauqua) and [her zine](https://etremagazine.com/2016/12/27/goodbye-a-zine-on-leaving/). i'm thankful for [nadiya](https://twitter.com/BegumNadiya) and [phoebe](http://nymag.com/thecut/2017/02/phoebe-waller-bridge-fleabag.html) and for [nadiya and phoebe](https://twitter.com/RadioTimes/status/839053961902624768) together. i'm thankful for [kflo](https://twitter.com/kkkffflo) and i'm thankful for [sappho](https://twitter.com/sapphobot) (as translated by [anne carson](https://www.poetryfoundation.org/poems-and-poets/poems/detail/48636), who i am also thankful for). i'm thankful for [virginia](https://twitter.com/the__waves). i'm thankful for [moe](http://tinyletter.com/thankyounotes/letters/thank-you-notes-moe-5). i'm thankful for [darcie](https://twitter.com/333333333433333), whose book i can't wait to get to read, and for [patricia](https://twitter.com/TriciaLockwood), whose book i also can't wait to read. i'm thankful for [women's art](https://twitter.com/womensart1). i'm thankful for [carina](https://twitter.com/presidents)'s [landscapes](https://twitter.com/presidents/status/839274616652763137). i'm thankful for [syar](https://twitter.com/syarsalia), who always shares [such interesting things](https://twitter.com/YeeILann/status/839394256187858944). i'm thankful for [mina](https://twitter.com/minakimes). i'm thankful for [carrie](https://twitter.com/caaf), editor [extraordinaire](https://catapult.co/community/stories/a-conversation-with-carrie-frye#). i'm thankful for [ruth](http://twitter.com/ruthcurry), [tassa](https://twitter.com/tasilsa), and [alexandra](https://twitter.com/alexandra_ewing), who have very interesting thoughts about TV and everything else. i'm thankful for [jacqui](https://twitter.com/DearSplenda), who says funny things about our horrible country. i'm thankful for [jane](http://twitter.com/hujane) and [her love of corgis](https://twitter.com/hujane/status/838489278912974848). i'm thankful for [jean](https://twitter.com/jhedelstein) and her [complex feelings about transportation](http://tinyletter.com/jeanhannah/letters/monday-special-edition-two-hours-under-the-big-board-at-penn-station) (among other things). i'm thankful for [chloe,](https://twitter.com/dsotspoon) despite [her taste in ice cream](https://twitter.com/dsotspoon/status/838891040090255360). i'm thankful for [chrissy](https://twitter.com/chrissyteigen) and [her honesty](http://www.glamour.com/story/chrissy-teigen-postpartum-depression). i'm thankful for [crissy](https://twitter.com/crissymilazzo) and [her honesty](https://twitter.com/crissymilazzo/status/839345324711796736). i'm thankful for [K](https://twitter.com/AliaM_H) and [her thoughtfulness](https://twitter.com/AliaM_H/status/839331488818692097). i'm thankful for [katie notopoulos](https://twitter.com/katienotopoulos), who finds [the best weirdest shit](https://twitter.com/katienotopoulos/status/838947054328115200). i'm thankful for [nozlee](https://twitter.com/nzle/), [who just might be wallace shawn](https://twitter.com/nzle/status/836711846723878912) in that one episode. i'm thankful for [molly](https://twitter.com/mollysoda/) and especially for [her food writing](https://twitter.com/mollysoda/status/839296739580469248). i'm thankful for [the tipsy baker](http://www.tipsybaker.com/). i'm thankful for [dana](https://twitter.com/danaanmm) and thankful to get to learn [what she is thankful for](http://danaanm.tumblr.com/post/158076692353/thank-you-notes-march-6th). i'm thankful for [casey](https://twitter.com/caseyjohnston), who is strong and who works [to make other women strong](https://thehairpin.com/tagged/ask-a-swole-woman) too. i'm thankful for [katie rose](https://twitter.com/katierosepipkin), who makes [beautiful machines](https://twitter.com/katierosepipkin/status/838082470880800768). i'm thankful for [fsa](https://twitter.com/chiquistrong) and to have revisited [her evocation of spring](http://tinyletter.com/thankyounotes/letters/thank-you-notes-fsa-7). i'm thankful for [kelly](https://twitter.com/kellyconaboy), who [makes me laugh](https://twitter.com/kellyconaboy/status/838944868399448064). i'm thankful for [jia](https://twitter.com/jiatolentino), who is [flames](http://www.newyorker.com/culture/jia-tolentino/the-womens-strike-and-the-messy-space-of-change?intcid=mod-latest). i'm thankful for [yoko](https://twitter.com/yokoono). i'm thankful there are too many amazing women to ever fit in a letter.
